page.title: 11BROOKSIDE WOODS ROTHERHAM
page.content: The woods are situated just off Brookside and they stretch right up to a snicket on Pearsons Close and further until it joins Gibbings Greave Woods,and if you look the other way you should see the farmland.When it is out of golf season a friend and I do an assault course through Herringthorpe Woods,across the golf course and down through Gibbings Greave Woods. There are lots of differant kinds of people go into the woods,the more dangerous of them are probably youths with air rifles and youths on motorcycles.There are gangs of skinheads walking round but you don't see many of those.Although there are lots of dangerous people there,most people are just walking their dogs.
